name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 Lily-ad Dungeon / リリィダンジョン / ＣＰ迷宮
detailed_description:
Having problems with raising a character's Lily Rank in-game? Need to bump up someone's trust? Not to worry, Nep f(r)iends! Grab the Lily-ad Dungeon DLC and explore Lily Rank specific dungeons to raise Lily Ranks fives times faster than normal! That's a huge boost, Nep friends!

Each time you defeat an enemy or if you use items that enemies drop, your Lily Rank increases! All the enemies are also recolored in a cutesy pink fashion!

How to Unlock in-Game: Lily Dungeon can be unlocked from Chapter 5. The dungeon is unlocked through plans.

This dungeon and the enemies that appear in this dungeon (Lily Dungeon) are the same for Rebirth1, Rebirth2, and Rebirth3.

short_description: The Lily-ad Dungeon DLC allow players to explore Lily Rank specific dungeons and raise their Lily Ranks at a faster rate!

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
